scripts.init: yarn bootstrap && yarn db:generate && yarn build
scripts.lib:build: yarn bootstrap && lerna run build --scope reshaped
scripts.lib:start: yarn bootstrap && lerna run start --scope reshaped
scripts.docs:build: yarn bootstrap && lerna run build --scope reshaped-website
scripts.docs:dev: yarn bootstrap && yarn --cwd packages/reshaped-website run dev
scripts.docs:start: yarn bootstrap && lerna run start --scope reshaped-website
scripts.build: yarn bootstrap && yarn db:generate && lerna run build --stream
scripts.release: read -p 'Have you updated VRT?' && yarn build && yarn --cwd packages/reshaped release && yarn release:source && read -p 'Add Figma archive to the release!'
scripts.release:test: yarn build && lerna run release:test --scope reshaped
scripts.release:source: git archive -o releases/$(jq -r .version packages/reshaped/package.json)/reshaped-source-v$(jq -r .version packages/reshaped/package.json).zip HEAD packages/reshaped tsconfig.json package.json lerna.json .eslintignore .eslintrc.json .gitignore .prettierignore .prettierrc yarn.lock
scripts.on:deploy: yarn build && mkdir -p dist && cp -r packages/reshaped-website/out/* dist && cp -r packages/reshaped/dist/app dist/storybook
scripts.deploy:website: yarn bootstrap && yarn db:generate && yarn --cwd packages/reshaped build:short && yarn --cwd packages/reshaped-website build
scripts.deploy: yarn deploy:start && yarn deploy:website && yarn deploy:storybook && yarn deploy:finish
